title: Fraction Tiles on the Grid

steps.prompt: Build different rectangles with unit squares.
Label each shape with the fraction of the whole it represents.
Compare two shapes and explain which is larger.

successCriteria: Learner partitions shapes and relates the pieces to fractional names.

title: Classify Lines and Angles

steps.prompt: Draw intersecting lines and identify angle types.
Use the protractor overlay to measure at least two angles.
Group shapes by their angle types.

successCriteria: Learner measures angles and labels each line pair correctly.

title: Graph Polygons on the Coordinate Plane

steps.prompt: Plot four points in quadrant I using the grid coordinates.
Connect the points to form a polygon.
Classify the polygon using side lengths or angle properties.

successCriteria: Learner plots and classifies a polygon by interpreting coordinates.
